page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: Thanks are due to: {Project Co-ordinator:}Robert Gove {Team:}Scott Cuthill,John Davidson, Catriona Duff,James Meacher and Ian Hamilton(for the photographs). {Reseachers:}Susan Baillie,Heather Murray,Jane Legge,Lesley Shearer and Callum Young. {Information supplied by:}Jack Smith (Editor of the Montrose Review),Alex I Mouat(Former Rector of Montrose Academy),Dect.Supt.Sneddon(Forfar CID) The staff of Montrose Library,Railway Station,Police Station and Esk House Clinic.Also Rev P.Malloch & Rev I. Douglas. {Thanks also to:}Seonaid Aitken,Nicola Sinclair and Diane Deacon for typing; the office staff of Montrose Academy. Also classes 2B,2D,2F and 2H.
